page.title: 11HELSTON INDUSTRIAL ESTATE(1)
page.content: {Helston's Industrial Estate}lies on the north west outskirts of the town, at Water-ma-Trout. In all about 300 people work there. Some firms moved to the estate from smaller premises in Helston. Most firms are growing concerns and many send their manufactured goods all over the world. The firm of Fred Rees has been operating on the Estate for 19 years. The most recent firm to move there is Cresta Bakers who moved there only 9 months ago. On the estate it is possible to buy anything from sausages to jeans, bedroom fitments or tractors. There is only one empty building on the site but no doubt the premises will be occupied by yet another thriving business.
